review: The Amazon Fire Tv, has a lot to offer, especially if your are within the Amazon umbrella of products. The video streaming was great and the ease of use of the interface was very smooth. I unfortunately have an IPhone and even though it was usable, it wasn't quite what I wanted. Airplay compatibility would be great but that's easier said then done. Other than that I would recommend the Amazon Fire tv to anyone who wants video streaming capabilities along with games and apps on their tv.
